name: BLUEBLUDS: Emerge demo
description:
Bluebluds: Emerge.  A free to play Game Demo.

This is a proof of concept demo protoype, with a introductory level set in the fantasy / action RPG genre, and introduces you to the Bluebluds world.  This is an introductory level, and not a finished product   There’s plans for future development with periodic updates.

The spell that banished the Bluebluds to limbo has been broken!  Uncover who these blue skinned reptiles are, and why have they attacked your village?
